title: Metal Scrap Might Be First Physical Evidence Of Amelia Earhart's Plane
teaser: A scrap of metal long ago discovered on a remote Pacific Island is believed to be the first physical evidence of Amelia Earhart's plane. NPR's Arun Rath talks with researcher Ric Gillespie.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
